import sys
assert sys.version_info[0]==3
assert sys.version_info[1] >= 5

import pprint
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = [10, 5]

import numpy as np
import random

np.random.seed(0)
random.seed(0)
